SEARCH
Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerMtoV, IControllerVtoM
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerVtoM, IControllerMtoV
Controller that orchestrates the simulation engine and the JavaFX UI.

Responsibilities:

  • Starts/stops the simulation engine and configures timing parameters.
  • Fetches persisted Run and RunStatistics via DAOs.
  • Schedules UI updates on the JavaFX Application Thread.

Threading: Methods may be called from the engine thread; all UI changes are marshalled via Platform.runLater(Runnable) to the JavaFX Application Thread.
